game.description: Explore the long-abandoned mine on the outskirts of town, uncover its secrets and put an end to whatever evil lurks within.
game.objective: Uncover the source of strange noises emanating from the old mine
game.quest_giver: Grizelda Ironfist, local blacksmith and concerned citizen

tasks.description: Investigate the entrance to the mine for any signs of recent use or disturbance
tasks.location: The old mine's entrance, just north of town
tasks.objective: Determine if anyone has entered the mine recently

tasks.description: Venture deeper into the mine and search for any signs of mineral deposits or hidden rooms
tasks.objective: Find a vein of precious ore

tasks.description: Confront and defeat the evil force in the mine's heart
tasks.location: The heart of the mine, 43.74° N, 119.42° W
tasks.objective: End the source of noises and disturbances

game.title: The Cursed Mine
